1.1.1.2.19. shapepipe.modules.vignetmaker_runner module¶

VIGNET MAKER RUNNER

This file contains methods to create stamp from images.

Author

Axel Guinot

shapepipe.modules.vignetmaker_runner.get_pos(galcat_path, pos_params, pos_type)[source]¶

Get positions

Get the positions of the given parameters from SExtractor catalog.

Parameters

  • galcat_path (str) – Path to the SExtractor catalog

  • pos_params (list) – List of string containing the SExtractor’s parameters to use as positions

Returns

Array of the positions

Return type

numpy.ndarray

shapepipe.modules.vignetmaker_runner.convert_pos(pos, image_path)[source]¶

Convert position

Convert positions from world coordinates to pixel coordinates.

Parameters

  • pos (numpy.ndarray) – Positions in world coordinates.

  • image_path (str) – Path to the image from where the stamp are created.

Returns

New positions in pixel coordinates.

Return type

numpy.ndarray

shapepipe.modules.vignetmaker_runner.get_stamp(img_path, galcat_path, pos, rad)[source]¶

Get stamp

Extract stamp at given positions on the image

Parameters

  • img_path (str) – Path to the image

  • galcat_path (str) – Path to the SExtractor catalog

  • pos_params (list) – List of string containing the SExtractor’s parameters to use as positions

  • rad (int) – Radius of the stamp, must be odd

Returns

Array containing the vignets

Return type

numpy.array

shapepipe.modules.vignetmaker_runner.get_original_vignet(galcat_path)[source]¶

Get original vignet

Get the vignets fromù te SExtractor catalog

Parameters

galcat_path (str) – Path to the SExtractor catalog

Returns

Array containing the vignets

Return type

numpy.ndarray

shapepipe.modules.vignetmaker_runner.make_mask(galcat_path, mask_value)[source]¶

Make mask

Change the value of the SExtractor mask on vignet

Parameters

  • galcat_path (str) – Path to the SExtractor catalog

  • mask_value (float) – New value of the mask

Returns

Array of the vignets with the new mask value

Return type

numpy.array

shapepipe.modules.vignetmaker_runner.save_vignet(vign, sexcat_path, output_dir, suffix)[source]¶

Save vignet

Save the vignet into a SExtractor format catalog

Parameters

  • sexcat_path (str) – Path to the original SExtractor catalog

  • output_dir (str) – Path to the output directory

shapepipe.modules.vignetmaker_runner.vignetmaker_runner(input_file_list, output_dir, file_number_string, config, w_log)[source]¶
